events.name: Ancient Shrine
events.description: A weathered stone shrine stands in a quiet alcove. Ancient runes pulse with a faint blue glow. The air feels charged with old magic.
events.flavorText: Offerings of coin and bone rest at the shrine's base. Whatever deity was worshipped here has not been entirely forgotten.

choices.label: Pray at the Shrine
choices.description: Kneel before the ancient altar and hope for divine favor.

outcomes.message: The shrine crackles with dark energy! The party takes 10 damage each.
A warm light washes over the party. Everyone recovers 25 HP.
Divine power surges through the shrine! Full HP restored and 15 MP recovered.

choices.label: Donate Gold (25g)
choices.description: Leave a generous offering at the shrine.

outcomes.message: The shrine glows brilliantly! Full HP restored and the party gains regeneration.

choices.label: Leave Quietly
choices.description: Best not to disturb whatever lingers here.

outcomes.message: You back away from the shrine and continue onward.

events.name: Traveling Merchant
events.description: A cloaked merchant has set up a makeshift stall in a secured alcove. Potions and curiosities line the shelves.
events.flavorText: "Welcome, brave adventurers! I have just what you need for the dangers ahead. Fair prices, I assure you."

outcomes.message: "Pleasure doing business!" You receive 2 Medium Potions and an Antidote.
"Fine choices!" You receive 2 Ethers and Smelling Salts.
"Perhaps next time, friends." The merchant waves you off.

events.name: Trapped Corridor
events.description: The corridor ahead is lined with suspicious floor tiles and dart holes in the walls. Faded warning runes mark the passage.
events.flavorText: Cobwebs cling to ancient mechanisms. Some traps may have degraded with age, but others look freshly maintained.

choices.label: Carefully Disarm
choices.description: Take your time to disarm the traps. Risky but rewarding.

outcomes.message: Success! You salvage trap components worth 35 gold.
A hidden mechanism triggers! Darts fly from the walls. Party takes 15 damage each.

choices.label: Sprint Through
choices.description: Run for it! Speed might save you.

outcomes.message: The party dashes through before the traps can activate!
Traps spring as you run! Blades and darts strike the party for 20 damage each.

choices.label: Find Safe Path (15g)
choices.description: Pay for a local guide's map of safe tiles.

outcomes.message: The guide's map leads you safely through. You find 10 gold in a hidden alcove along the way.

events.name: Hidden Treasury
events.description: Behind a crumbling wall, you discover a sealed vault. Ancient protective wards still shimmer on the lock.
events.flavorText: Gold coins spill from cracks in the vault door. Whatever is inside must be substantial.

choices.label: Break the Wards
choices.description: Smash through with brute force. Painful but guaranteed treasure.

outcomes.message: The wards explode! The party takes 20 damage each, but you claim 50 gold and a Large Potion.

choices.label: Carefully Dispel
choices.description: Attempt to unravel the wards without triggering them.

outcomes.message: The wards dissolve harmlessly! You claim 40 gold, a Mega Ether, and a Strength Tonic.
The dispel fails and the wards lash out! Party takes 12 damage each. You salvage 20 gold.

choices.label: Take Loose Coins
choices.description: Grab what's spilling out and move on. Safe but modest.

outcomes.message: You pocket the coins on the ground. 20 gold gained.
